comment.author: 26105073@N03
comment._content:
This "flood" of UK aircraft photos is amazing!! It will take quite awhile to view them, and I have questions/requests (I'm sure I 'speak for' many other 'contacts') : 
Are you planning to make this a 'set', making it easier for viewing? 
Are all of these photos from one single collection you have received? Details about about who this collection belonged to? I would hope that they were 'a SD local' ...  (I'm sending you a Flickr email)

Thank-you for posting these! I'll tell others about them, including friends in the UK!

comment.author: 49487266@N07
comment._content: These images were ones in our general aviation collection which we just digitized...it so happens that many of the aircraft are from the UK. I created a new set www.flickr.com/photos/sdasmarchives/sets/72157630610709398/ so you can easily view them.
comment.authorname: San Diego Air & Space Museum Archives
